jobTitle: Project Coordinator for IT Finance - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you ready to take your career to the next level? We're looking for an experienced Project Coordinator to support our IT/Finance Team in Los Alamitos. This is a 100% remote opportunity, offering you the flexibility to work from the comfort of your own home.

What You'll Do

As a Project Coordinator, you'll play a vital role in ensuring smooth operations by:

  • Managing multiple email inboxes related to invoicing and company-owned tasks.
  • Maintaining and updating spreadsheets with essential consultant information, including purchase orders (POs), resource numbers, term dates, and hire dates.
  • Handling purchase orders (creation and lookup) and managing accounts payable tasks, including invoice creation and lookup.
  • Working with SAP SuccessFactors to manage contingent workers, terminations, extensions, and more.
  • Processing access requests and lookups in IVANTI.
  • Managing PWA timesheets, including distributing them to vendors every Tuesday.
  • Preparing accrual sheets and managing invoicing and hours worked.
  • Handling terminations and managing shared folders in Ivanti.
  • Organizing folders in the shared site for easy access and retrieval.
  • Inputting contracts and searching for Statements of Work (SOWs) in CARS, along with managing vendor contact information for SOWs.
  • Assisting with SEC reporting and other critical tasks.

Role Details

  • Work Schedule: Full-time, 40 hours per week (Monday to Friday, 8 AM - 5 PM PST).
  • Duration: Temporary position for approximately 5 months to cover a leave of absence.
  • Pay Rate: $27.50 - $30/hr (The exact rate will depend on your education, experience, location, and other factors).

What We're Looking For

  • 1-2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably within an IT or Finance team.
  • A high school diploma or GED.
  • Strong communication skills.
  • Proficiency in MS Excel.
  • The ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple responsibilities efficiently.

If you're detail-oriented, proactive, and ready to make an impact, we'd love to hear from you!

How To Apply

Qualified candidates are encouraged to apply now and take the first step towards joining a dynamic and supportive team.

Employment Type: Full-Time
